gen:link.msg:message: De datum gerapporteerd voor `DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearEndDate` MOET liggen voor of op het einde van de voorgaande periode. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtDateEarlierEQThanPreviousEnd2_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtDateEarlierEQThanPreviousEnd2_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

De datum gerapporteerd voor `DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearStartDate` MOET liggen op of na de start van de voorgaande periode. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtDateLaterEQThanPreviousStart1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearStartDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtDateLaterEQThanPreviousStart1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearStartDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearEndDate` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis`, omdat `NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU1_Set00NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU1_Set00NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearStartDate` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis`, omdat `NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU2_Set00NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU2_Set00NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IndividualMaximumRemuneration` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis`, omdat `NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU3_Set00NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU3_Set00NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PositionOrPositions` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis`, omdat `NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU4_Set00NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU4_Set00NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Remuneration` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis`, omdat `NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU5_Set00NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU5_Set00NameOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialWithoutEmploymentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
